New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 7 月 9 日，星期二 10:09:27 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Police release name of Ōamaru rest home staff member who died after being hit by car on SH1 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-release-name-of-oamaru-rest-home-staff-member-who-died-after-being-hit-by-car-on-sh1/ VR6YDLEUJJD7NHUPH2H2NHZCQY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-release-name-of-oamaru-rest-home-staff-member-who-died-after-being-hit-by-car-on-sh1/ VR6YDLEUJJD7NHUPH2H2NHZCQY/ The woman had been visiting a care home resident before the accident. Tue, 09 Jul 2024 09:27:50 +0000 A long-standing staff member of an Ōamaru residential care home died after being hit by a car on State Highway 1 on Sunday.
Hamish Ray burned down ex-partner’s Tākaka rental, destroying long-standing family home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamish-ray-burned-down-ex-partners-takaka-rental-destroying-long-stand-family-home/JOHP7EAAWJE2HEP4YT7HYUBDCA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamish-ray-burned-down-ex-partners-takaka-rental-destroying-long-stand-family-home/JOHP7EAAWJE2HEP4YT7HYUBDCA/ Tracy NealHamish Ray hung his head and cried as the consequences of his actions sunk in. Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:00:00 +0000 Hamish Ray (inset) has been sent to prison for burning down a home occupied by his ex-partner. The homestead was a revered 1932 bungalow that had been in the Harwood family for four generations. Photo / NZ Police

Tue, 09 Jul 2024 07:58:07 +0000 Police were investigating after the robbery.
Christchurch park killing: Family mourn slain grandfather Mewa Singh fatally attacked after being mistaken for child abductor https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-park-killing-family-mourn-slain-grandfather-mewa-singh-fatally-attacked-after-mistaken-for-child-abductor/GBB4NZ74GVCQRJIFWYUBSNL5NU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-park-killing-family-mourn-slain-grandfather-mewa-singh-fatally-attacked-after-mistaken-for-child-abductor/GBB4NZ74GVCQRJIFWYUBSNL5NU/ 'When I left for work that day everything was good.'Tue, 09 Jul 2024 07:08:05 +0000 Mewa Singh, 60, lying in the Christchurch Hospital after being knocked unconcious near Linwood Park.
Leaked Darleen Tana report reveals details of investigation, claims husband’s evidence incoherent https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/leaked-darleen-tana-report-reveals-details-of-investigation-claims-husband-wasnt-coherent/6E3IKYFXKBAGZKRWVMUQONK77A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/leaked-darleen-tana-report-reveals-details-of-investigation-claims-husband-wasnt-coherent/6E3IKYFXKBAGZKRWVMUQONK77A/ Adam PearseThe investigation lasted 114 days, causing frustration for the party co-leaders. Tue, 09 Jul 2024 07:00:48 +0000 Darleen Tana has resigned from the Green Party. Photo / NZME
Early childhood teacher who allegedly kissed 3yo on lips faces tribunal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/early-childhood-teacher-allegedly-kissed-3yo-on-lips-now-faceing-tribunal/T4JVHPVTQJFWHAUMRD7QZLEC3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/early-childhood-teacher-allegedly-kissed-3yo-on-lips-now-faceing-tribunal/T4JVHPVTQJFWHAUMRD7QZLEC3Y/ Jeremy Wilkinson"Cuddling is fine but a kiss is different," one of the man's colleagues told a tribunal. Tue, 09 Jul 2024 07:00:00 +0000 The reliever teacher allegedly kissed a 3yo boy on the lips twice. Photo / Dean Purcell.
Power cut: Transpower ‘coldly’ denies compensation to Northland businesses https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/power-cut-transpower-coldly-denies-compensation-to-northland-businesses/2UG77II3LNC7JFD5OFQ75UGWFQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/power-cut-transpower-coldly-denies-compensation-to-northland-businesses/2UG77II3LNC7JFD5OFQ75UGWFQ/ Denise PiperTranspower has decided not to be proactive in any compensation or help for Northland. Tue, 09 Jul 2024 06:34:04 +0000 Transpower crews prepare to put up a temporary tower to transfer electricity to Northland after a 220kV transmission tower fell over when too many nuts were removed during maintenance. Transpower says it has no obligation to ensure power is delivered. Photo / Transpower

Tue, 09 Jul 2024 06:15:02 +0000 Hauraki District Council voted to introduce Māori Wards in October 2023.
